explanation: All numbers except 14 are odd; 14 is the only even number.
Sequence are perfect cubes (2³,3³,4³,5³,6³,7³). 100 is not a perfect cube.
All numbers except 54 are multiples of 5; 54 is not divisible by 5.
In every number except 427 the middle digit equals the sum of the first and third digits. 427 does not satisfy this.
All numbers except 28 are multiples of 3; 28 is not divisible by 3.
All terms except 23 are perfect squares (1,4,9,16,25,36). 23 is not a square.
The pattern is perfect squares (1²,2²,3²,4²,5²,6²,7²). 20 is not 5².
Pattern is n²+1 for n=1..8 → last term should be 65. 64 is out of pattern.
All numbers except 21 are even; 21 is the only odd number.
Except 72, all numbers are perfect squares (16,25,36,144,196,225). 72 is not a square.
For every number except 383, middle digit = product of first and third digits. 383 does not satisfy this.
In all numbers except 751, |third digit − first digit| = middle digit. 751 does not satisfy this.
All numbers except 81 are prime numbers; 81 = 9×9 is composite.
All numbers except 12 are prime; 12 is the only composite number.
